text: Aylostera is a genus of cactus that has two subgenera. They are Aylostera and Mediolobivia. It is not certain which plants are members of this genus and which are part of Rebutia.Mosti & Papini Further Insight and New Combinations in Aylostera (Cactaceae) Based on Molecular and Morphological Data == Taxonomy == * A albiareolata (F.Ritter)Mosti et Papini * A albiflora (F.Ritter et Buiing)Backeb. * A albipilosa (F.
